title: Get a reservation
description: Retrieves a specified BigQuery reservation. Use this to check a reservation's details, such as its slot capacity and whether it ignores idle slots.

objective.narrative: This sample addresses the developer need to programmatically inspect the configuration of a specific BigQuery reservation. This action is common for auditing purposes or to verify capacity and settings before assigning a project to the reservation.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservation_get
regionTags.title: Get a reservation
